column5: went out chucking some dry flys for some browns but the water was high and coloured from the rains we have been having. i put on a big egg suckin leech and WAM nailed a nice rainbow with some wicked jumps she was very skinny and tired out quick in the warm water. the next pool BAM this nice big butterscotch brown!! i think i can keep catching rainbows until they start running again in the fall with the way this year has been! peace.
Nice to see some river fish again.
that rainbow is missing like half its tail    i wish i knew of some cool streams to fish for trib trout near hamilton
Very noice!  Summer steel... and still in the river!  Must be reluctant to fall back with that injured tail.  Cool find man and nice brown!  cheers HD
that bow was dam unhappy when i hooked her you would think that half a tail wouldnt let it fight so well but 4-5 foot jumps all over the place shheeeesh. imagine if it had a full tail!!!
Very nice summer bow and some nice browns too. Thanks for sharing. Looks like your having  a great summer!
Great stuff!  Makes me miss trib fishing....but don't get me wrong, I'm not wishing the summer away quite yet....LOL.
